## üåæ AGRICULTURAL CLEANUP PHILOSOPHY

### Biodynamic Cleanup Cycles (Seasonal Patterns)

```typescript
interface SeasonalCleanupStrategy {
  spring: {
    focus: "Remove winter dormancy files";
    pattern: "Prepare soil for new growth";
    actions: ["Clear temp files", "Update dependencies", "Refresh configs"];
  };

  summer: {
    focus: "Aggressive growth management";
    pattern: "Prune excessive growth";
    actions: [
      "Remove unused features",
      "Optimize bundles",
      "Clean build artifacts",
    ];
  };

  fall: {
    focus: "Harvest and preserve";
    pattern: "Gather learnings, archive wisdom";
    actions: ["Document patterns", "Archive old code", "Prepare for winter"];
  };

  winter: {
    focus: "Deep rest and reflection";
    pattern: "Minimal intervention";
    actions: ["Security audit", "Dependency update", "Plan next season"];
  };
}
```
